StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SaveContactInforma.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonId uniqueiden..er, @HomeEmail varchar(100), @HomePhone varchar(20), @MobilePhone varchar(20), @WorkEmail varchar(20), @WorkPhone varchar(20) ) AS BEGIN
BEGIN TRANSACTION
IF EXISTS(SELECT PersonId FROM [ACP].ContactInforma.on WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId) BEGIN UPDATE [ACP].[ContactInforma.on] SET [HomeEmail] = @HomeEmail, [HomePhone] = @HomePhone, [MobilePhone] = @MobilePhone, [WorkEmail] = @WorkEmail, [WorkPhone] = @WorkPhone WHERE [PersonId] = @PersonId END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [ACP].[ContactInforma.on] ( [PersonId], [HomeEmail], [HomePhone], [MobilePhone], [WorkEmail], [WorkPhone] ) VALUES ( @PersonId, @HomeEmail, @HomePhone, @MobilePhone, @WorkEmail, @WorkPhone )
END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully. COMMIT TRANSACTION END
